website_summaries.verdict: It's a sufficient choice for the price, but similarly priced competitors offer faster readings and a more reliable battery life.
pros: Very user-friendly operation and easily readable LED display screen
cons: Tends to burn through batteries and can trigger a low battery warning if battery quality is sub-par

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely inaccurate. The item arrived defective and I compared it to 3 other breathalyzers that were all recently calibrated and this one was always significantly off. Example: this read a .18 when there was 0 alcohol in system and all 3 others read .000. Waste of money to try and have something portable. Do not recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Only works about 20 percent of the time. The rest of the time it throws error codes. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L Petty

customer_reviews.title: Great safety tool
customer_reviews.text: Again, another great buy! I take it with me when I go wine tasting or hanging out with friends. It fun to see how long it takes before your alcohol levels go back to .00 or .01 after one glass.
customer_reviews.author: igill

customer_reviews.title: Breathalyzer was inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Often asking me to reset it, it gave false readings numerous times. Would not buy from this company or certainly not this product again. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: pearl

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one of these
customer_reviews.text: If you follow instruction this device is accurate. I compared it to another one and both were very close. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: katherinec337

customer_reviews.title: Worked....for a little while.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a solid 3 months, and then worked intermittently, now it’s just not working at all. But when it was working it gave spot on readings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks, it takes to long to calibrate before each blow and it is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rosso

customer_reviews.title: The younger crowd love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a gag gift at Christmas. The younger crowd love it .
customer_reviews.author: gil458

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from product and seller!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this product and seller!!!! Bought this product to take overseas and it didn't work properly. Keep saying repeat and when it did give a reading it varied a lot. Contacted seller and they refused to accept return product and instead told me contact the company. I now understand why it's better to go to a store and buy a product
customer_reviews.author: nish

customer_reviews.title: y hope than buy a good
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product, idnt yet proved, y hope than buy a good prodct
customer_reviews.author: juan rivera

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who drinks outside their homes should carry one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who drinks outside their homes should carry one of these, even if you don't drink-you could prevent domeone else from making a tragic mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bolton

customer_reviews.title: This device is HIGHLY inaccurate, buy fuel cell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device based on the ratings it had and the “Amazon’s Choice” label it carried. It was a horrible mistake. I took this to drink with 2 of my friends and we consumed a large amount of alcohol. We had 5 beers a piece and 3 shots all within 2 hours. We waited the 30 minutes and both tried it. We received a .01 and .00 and we both tried 4 separate times. Before anyone says we didn’t follow the directions, we set them in front of us and read it multiple times. Do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: but I hate how long it takes to calibrate
customer_reviews.text: I needed a breathalyzer after one of my friends drove drunk and I wanted to prevent that from ever happening again.I bought this one for its high accuracy ratings, but I hate how long it takes to calibrate. Still, I highly recommend having one in your tool bag, as you never know who or when someone you love will try to drive drunk. It's a great way to prove to them they're not legally capable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design and easy to use. After testing it a few times, I am confident it is highly accurate, which is what I was expecting since it was one of the US NHTSA's approved devices for police use. I think the mid-level pricing was worth the added accuracy and NHTSA's assurance. Very satisfied! Anyone who complains about inaccuracy probably didn't follow directions (i.e. no smoking, eating or drinking 30 minutes prior to use).
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Device is very easy to use and seems very accurate (can’t compare results as I only have one device)—. But I’ve used them had a friend use, we did this multiple times and my numbers were exactly the same as were hers (comes with extra tips for the mouthpiece)——- 60 second countdown timer before you use, and sensors seem to clear themselves quickly. Everyone should have one in their glove compartment!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to tools to help parents to keep their children on the right track.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for my daughter whom we are helping through AA.... to check for the truth of her sobriety.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model that works better than this. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: I rate this a four because I have no other ...
customer_reviews.text: I rate this a four because I have no other comparison to see how accurate it is, but I do depend on it if I've had a couple of beers.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: After 2 drinks blew 0.01, 0.06, 0,00 within 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: ... teenage driver knows we mean business and it works great. No problems
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to make sure our teenage driver knows we mean business and it works great. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Charity R

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to anyone who needs to be sure there ...
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate, I would recommend it to anyone who needs to be sure there is no trace of alcohol in their system. I measured it against several other monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

product_meta.title: Alcohawk Q3I-2700 Slim 2 Digital Breathalyzer
product_meta.description: Why guess? Test your Blood Alcohol Concentration (B.A.C.) with confidence using AlcoHAWK Breathalyzers! The AlcoHAWK Elite Slim Digital Breath Alcohol Detector, built on quality and performance, has a professional feel and sleek consumer appearance! Operating on a single button, simply blow into the folding mouthpiece for an accurate BAC reading in seconds. The AlcoHAWK Elite Slim also includes removable mouthpiece covers that allow you to test multiple individuals in a sanitary fashion. This unit is equipped with rounded corners and a bright blue back-lit LCD display. The sleek design makes the AlcoHAWK Elite Slim very compact and easy to carry. It is the ideal solution for someone looking for a portable tester with professional quality with a consumer design and feel. Meets DOT/NHTSA Model Specifications for Breath Alcohol Screeners. Important Information: • This breath alcohol tester is intended to measure alcohol in human breath. Readings from this device are used to determine alcohol intoxication. • Individuals should not drink alcohol and drive • Choking hazard alert – Mouthpiece covers
feature_bullets: Sensor Recognition Technology to monitor for certain types of abnormal sensor conditions
Folding mouthpiece with replaceable mouthpiece covers
Calibrated prior to shipment in our USA Service Center
Includes: AlcoHAWK Elite Slim unit, three mouthpieces, owner's manual, quick start guide, and a 1 year warranty
